title: Test result group
description: Test results from a test group of arbitrary taxonomy.

name.description: Display name of the test group, e.g. 'Validation tests', 'Compilation tests', 'Grading tests' etc.

points.description: Amount of points awarded from all tests within this test group.

maxPoints.description: Maximum amount of possible points from passing all tests within this test group.

testResults.description: Test results for all tests in a test group

testsRun.description: Amount of tests run from this group

fullOutput.description: Full, unmodified console output from running all tests in the group as a single test suite.
